Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.name: readTerminator
Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.abstract: The string to terminate messages with when reading from an instrument.s

Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.name: writeTerminator
Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.abstract: The string to terminate messages with when writing to an instrument.

Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.name: operationDelay
Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.abstract: The delay in seconds to wait before reading or writing. Some instruments will fail when writing to or reading from in too short succession.

Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.name: chunkSize
Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.abstract: The size in bytes to read data from the instrument at a time.

Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.name: encoding
Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.abstract: The string encoding to use when decoding from the instrument, or when encoding to write to the instrument.

Structs/DefaultBoolDecoder.html#/s:13Cor.name: decode(_:)
Structs/DefaultBoolDecoder.html#/s:13Cor.abstract: Decodes a message from a VISA instrument into a Bool.

Structs/DefaultBoolDecoder.html#/s:13Cor.name: customDecode
Structs/DefaultBoolDecoder.html#/s:13Cor.abstract: If not nil, the decoder uses this function to decode strings.

Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder/Error.html#.name: notInRange
Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder/Error.html#.abstract: The message was not in the range of SCPI numerical values.

Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder.html#/s:13C.name: decode(_:)
Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder.html#/s:13C.abstract: Decodes a message from a VISA instrument into a Double.

Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder.html#/s:13C.name: customDecode
Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder.html#/s:13C.abstract: If not nil, the decoder uses this function to decode strings.

Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder/Error.html.name: Error
Structs/DefaultDoubleDecoder/Error.html.abstract: An error that results form trying to decode a message to a number.

Structs/DefaultIntDecoder/Error.html#/s:.name: notAnInteger
Structs/DefaultIntDecoder/Error.html#/s:.abstract: The message was a number, but was not an integer.

Structs/DefaultIntDecoder/Error.html#/s:.name: notInRange
Structs/DefaultIntDecoder/Error.html#/s:.abstract: The message was an integer, but was outside the range of representable integers.

Structs/DefaultIntDecoder.html#/s:13Core.name: decode(_:)
Structs/DefaultIntDecoder.html#/s:13Core.abstract: Decodes a message from a VISA instrument as an Int.

Structs/DefaultIntDecoder.html#/s:13Core.name: customDecode
Structs/DefaultIntDecoder.html#/s:13Core.abstract: If not nil, the decoder uses this function to decode strings.

Structs/DefaultIntDecoder/Error.html.name: Error
Structs/DefaultIntDecoder/Error.html.abstract: An error that results from trying to decode a message to an integer.

Structs/DefaultStringDecoder.html#/s:13C.name: decode(_:)
Structs/DefaultStringDecoder.html#/s:13C.abstract: Decodes a message from a VISA instrument as a String.

Structs/DefaultStringDecoder.html#/s:13C.name: customDecode
Structs/DefaultStringDecoder.html#/s:13C.abstract: If not nil, the decoder uses this function to decode strings.

Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.name: MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes
Structs/MessageBasedInstrumentAttributes.abstract: Instrument attributes for customizing communication to VISA complient instruments.

Protocols/Session.html#/s:13CoreSwiftVIS.name: close()
Protocols/Session.html#/s:13CoreSwiftVIS.abstract: Closes the session. The instrument owning this session will no longer be able to read or write data.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: attributes
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Instrument attributes, such as terminators and encodings.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: read(until:strippingTerminator:encoding:chunkSize:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Reads string data from the device until the terminator is reached.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: readBytes(length:chunkSize:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Reads the given number of bytes from the device.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: readBytes(maxLength:until:strippingTerminator:chunkSize:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Reads bytes from the device until the given sequence of data is reached.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: query(_:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a string to the instrument, then reads back the response from the instrument.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: query(_:as:using:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a string to the instrument, then reads back the response from the instrument and decodes it to the specified type using the given decoder.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: query(_:as:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a string to the instrument, then reads back the response from the instrument and decodes it to the specified type using the type’s defualt decoder.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: queryBytes(_:length:as:using:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a sequence of bytes to the instrument, then reads back a number of bytes from the instrument and decodes it to the specified type using the given decoder.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: queryBytes(_:length:as:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a sequence of bytes to the instrument, then reads back a number of bytes from the instrument and decodes it to the specified type using the type’s default decoder.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: queryBytes(_:maxLength:as:using:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a sequence of bytes to the instrument, then reads back a sequence of bytes from the instrument and decodes it to the specified type using the given decoder.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.name: queryBytes(_:maxLength:as:)
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html#/s.abstract: Writes a sequence of bytes to the instrument, then reads back a sequence of bytes from the instrument and decodes it to the specified type using the type’s default decoder.

Protocols/Instrument.html#/s:13CoreSwift.name: session
Protocols/Instrument.html#/s:13CoreSwift.abstract: The session that this insturment is connected over.

Protocols/ByteDecoder.html#/s:13CoreSwif.name: DecodingType
Protocols/ByteDecoder.html#/s:13CoreSwif.abstract: The type that this decoder decodes values to.

Protocols/ByteDecoder.html#/s:13CoreSwif.name: decode(_:)
Protocols/ByteDecoder.html#/s:13CoreSwif.abstract: Decodes a sequence of bytes from a VISA instrument.

Protocols/ByteDecodable.html#/s:13CoreSw.name: defaultByteDecoder
Protocols/ByteDecodable.html#/s:13CoreSw.abstract: The default byte decoder used when calling read(as:) or decode(_:as:).

Protocols/MessageDecoder.html#/s:13CoreS.name: DecodingType
Protocols/MessageDecoder.html#/s:13CoreS.abstract: The type that this decoder decodes values to.

Protocols/MessageDecoder.html#/s:13CoreS.name: decode(_:)
Protocols/MessageDecoder.html#/s:13CoreS.abstract: Decodes a message from a VISA instrument.

Protocols/MessageDecodable.html#/s:13Cor.name: DefaultMesssageDecoder
Protocols/MessageDecodable.html#/s:13Cor.abstract: The type of the default message decoder this type uses.

Protocols/MessageDecodable.html#/s:13Cor.name: defaultMessageDecoder
Protocols/MessageDecodable.html#/s:13Cor.abstract: The default message decoder used when calling read(as:) or decode(_:as:).

Protocols/MessageDecodable.html.name: MessageDecodable
Protocols/MessageDecodable.html.abstract: A type that provides a default message decoder.

Protocols/MessageDecoder.html.name: MessageDecoder
Protocols/MessageDecoder.html.abstract: A type that can decode a message from a VISA instrument and convert it into another type.

Protocols/ByteDecodable.html.name: ByteDecodable
Protocols/ByteDecodable.html.abstract: A type that provides a default byte decoder.

Protocols/ByteDecoder.html.name: ByteDecoder
Protocols/ByteDecoder.html.abstract: A type that can decode a sequence of bytes from a VISA instrument and convert it into another type.

Protocols/Instrument.html.name: Instrument
Protocols/Instrument.html.abstract: An external instrument that can be connected to.

Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html.name: MessageBasedInstrument
Protocols/MessageBasedInstrument.html.abstract: An instrument that can be communicated with via strings or raw bytes.

Classes/InstrumentManager.html#/s:13Core.name: connectionTimeout
Classes/InstrumentManager.html#/s:13Core.abstract: How long to wait when trying to connect to instruments for the first time.

Classes/InstrumentManager.html.name: InstrumentManager
Classes/InstrumentManager.html.abstract: A class that is used to connect to VISA instruments.
